headline: KBW Announces Index Rebalancing for Third-Quarter 2025
summary: NEW YORK, Sept. 12, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Keefe, Bruyette & Woods, Inc., a leading specialist investment bank to the financial services and fintech sectors, and a wholly owned subsidiary of Stifel Financial Corp. (NYSE: SF), announces the upcoming index rebalancing for the third quarter of 2025. This quarter, there are constituent changes within one of our indexes: KBW Regional Banking Index (Index Ticker: KRX, ETF Ticker: KBWR). These changes will be effective prior to the opening of busines
